reviewtext: I bought this camera used and have been pleased in every regard.  It takes crisp, clear pictures.  The flash is strong.  The battery life is excellent.  Unless you plan to enlarge your photos to 8" x 10" (and would need more pixels), I recommend this camera whole-heartedly.Last week, I used a friend's adorable, new Olympus Stylus Verve and I couldn't believe the difference in photo quality.  This old Sony takes pictures 100 times better.  It's also very easy to use, has a large LCD display that rotates--so you can turn it inward when not in use (protecting the screen) and you can take pictures of yourself without any guesswork.It's a great camera.  Grab one while you can.
